body:
@meteorcloudy it indeed does not work for GPU support

```
$ bazel build -c opt $BUILD_OPTS --config=win-cuda tensorflow/tools/pip_package:build_pip_package
WARNING: C:/tensorflow/tensorflow/workspace.bzl:30:5:
Current Bazel is not a release version, cannot check for compatibility.
WARNING: C:/tensorflow/tensorflow/workspace.bzl:31:5: Make sure that you are running at least Bazel 0.4.5.
.
ERROR: no such target '//:GPU': target 'GPU' not declared in package '' defined by C:/tensorflow/BUILD.
INFO: Elapsed time: 9.422s
```
